sentence: Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano won the GOP gubernatorial primary after pushing unsubstantiated claims of widespread voter fraud in the 2020 election.
author: Sarakshi Rai
title: Kinzinger says Cawthorn loss good for the country

sentence: On Tuesday, May 17, the Big Lie and the Stop the Steal? movement enjoyed a major victory when Pennsylvania State Sen. Doug Mastriano a far-right Christian nationalist and QAnon ally won the 2022 GOP gubernatorial nomination in the Keystone State.
author: Alex Henderson
title: A Las Vegas paper just published a stunning editorial: 'We are struggling to identify' Republicans 'who are not an active threat' to democracy
